TextLibrary.Text: Styvren of Siria
You fought with divine grace, young knight. You have proven that you are, indeed, of the house of Albion - one of the most noble houses in all of Siria.
You fought with divine grace, young knight. You have proven that you are, indeed, of the house of Albion - one of the most noble houses in all of Siria.
You fought with divine grace, young knight. You have proven that you are, indeed, of the house of Albion - one of the most noble houses in all of Siria.
You fought with divine grace, young knight. You have proven that you are, indeed, of the house of Albion - one of the most noble houses in all of Siria.
Thank you, Sir.
Thank you, Sir.
Thank you, Sir.
Thank you, Sir.
When your training is complete, we hope that you will return and join the Sirian Knights.
When your training is complete, we hope that you will return and join the Sirian Knights.
When your training is complete, we hope that you will return and join the Sirian Knights.
When your training is complete, we hope that you will return and join the Sirian Knights.
What can you tell me about the Sirian Order, Sir?
What can you tell me about the Sirian Order, Sir?
What can you tell me about the Sirian Order, Sir?
What can you tell me about the Sirian Order, Sir?
We are the oldest Order, and truly the closest to Sirian Allfather himself. Our quest takes us forth into the world, purging it of depravity.

We are the oldest Order, and truly the closest to Sirian Allfather himself. Our quest takes us forth into the world, purging it of depravity.
The mere rumor of our presence strikes fear in the hearts of the agents of evil.

Thank you. We may meet again!
